name: Grapple Tanks
description:
Traverse dynamic terrains and engage in an endless deathmatch with a grappling-hook-equipped tank. Outlast and outmaneuver your opponents in Grapple Tanks, a 2D multiplayer shooter game playable with up to 4 people.

Grapple Tanks is playable with 2-4 players. Play online with friends or join a public match!

Dynamic Terrain

Break through walls, floors and ceilings that are in your way.

Weapons

Pick up weapon drops and deal devastating damage.

Powerups

Use powerups to gain a formidable advantage against your opponents.
